overview: The death of Sumiati brings misfortune to Lestari Suciptoâ€™s families. Sumiati is an employee in garment company owned by Lestari, a widow with two children, Agus and Wulan. Lestari family is often visited by haunting spirits. Lestari call an expert, Mr Gozali. He unlocks all the secrets about the haunting spirits.
title: Mysterious
